trends: There has been one other sighting in Coconut Creek
There were no other sightings in Coconut Creek on or around December 20th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi saw last night december 20th 2012 with my daughter while leaving costco walking towards my car a bright star flickering different colors facing southeast. i started noticing these stars appeared more frequently since the beginning of 2012. before the summer i have seen them facing north and west. in the last few months they seem to be spending more time in a place hovering and they have been facing northeast or southeast. one night after thanksgiving when jupiter was closest to earth i got home from work\grocery shopping and there were 6 hovering stars hovering around covering the sky a 360 degree angle. i though must have been a busy important night. you can see at a naked eye. with my binoculars you can see closer and greater detail. i have made many videos as well with my canon 60d camera. i���m now shopping for a good quality telescope.
